text: Mirror Maru is the debut extended play (EP) by Norwegian DJ, record producer, musician and turntablist Cashmere Cat, released on 22 October 2012 by Pelican Fly. == Reception == Jonah Bromwich of Pitchfork gave the album a positive review, stating that "though it's only 15 minutes long, the EP manages to communicate a fully realized artistic persona, one that finds the beating heart underneath all that scratched vinyl." === Legacy === "Kiss Kiss", "Mirror Maru" and "Paws" were sampled by Shawn Wasabi for his mashup song "Marble Soda". This song was appear in Grand Theft Auto V on worldwide fm. A 2013 game == Track listing == Notes * "Mirror Maru" samples "Some Cut" by Trillville featuring Cutty. == References == Category:2012 EPs Category:Cashmere Cat albums Category:Indietronica EPs Category:Albums produced by Cashmere Cat
title: Mirror Maru
